tool.name: DownloadTaskAssistantWorkbook
tool.summary: Given the name of a Task Assistant workbook that's been embedded in the Workflow Manager database, this tool downloads the workbook from the DB and saves it to disk.
tool.usage:
• The default Workflow Manager database must be set before running this tool.

  • The user running this tool must have administrative access to the Workflow Manager database.

param.name: in_string_sourceName
param.displayname: Source Name (name of TA workbook to retrieve from database)
param.dialogReference:
The name of the Task Assistant workbook to be downloaded.

The domain for this parameter is based on the Task Assistant workbooks present in the Workflow Manager database.
param.pythonReference:
The name of the Task Assistant workbook to be downloaded.

The domain for this parameter is based on the Task Assistant workbooks present in the Workflow Manager database.

param.name: out_file_tamWorkbookXml
param.displayname: Target Workbook (path to output Task Assistant workbook XML file)
param.dialogReference:
The location and name of the .xml file to which the Task Assistant workbook should be downloaded.

NOTE: The tool will also save a ".TMStyle" file of the same name to the same location, to preserve any icon styles associated with the workbook.
param.pythonReference:
The location and name of the .xml file to which the Task Assistant workbook should be downloaded.

NOTE: The tool will also save a ".TMStyle" file of the same name to the same location, to preserve any icon styles associated with the workbook.

param.name: in_string_wmxDatabaseAlias
param.dialogReference: An optional parameter specifying that this tool should run on some database other than the default Workflow Manager database. If left blank, the default Workflow Manager database will be used.
param.pythonReference: An optional parameter specifying that this tool should run on some database other than the default Workflow Manager database. If left blank, the default Workflow Manager database will be used.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Given the name of a Task Assistant workbook that's been embedded in the Workflow Manager database, this tool downloads the workbook from the DB and saves it to disk.
